message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in the game.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - you know the value decreases faster for you with each round.
Bob, my friend, I understand the time pressure, but I also need a reasonable deal. This offer is fair and we should close it now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split to end this now.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
